text: Broye-Vully District () is a district in the canton of Vaud, Switzerland. The capital is the town of Payerne. ==Municipalities== Coat of arms Name Population (31 Dec 2015) Area in km² Avenches 4110 17.56 Bellerive 632 2.26 Brenles 144 3.83 Bussy-sur- Moudon 198 3.09 Carrouge 1111 5.42 Cerniaz 55 1.80 Chabrey 267 3.96 Champtauroz 133 3.05 Chavannes-sur-Moudon 224 5.14 Chesalles-sur-Moudon 169 1.67 Chevroux 435 4.37 Combremont-le-Grand 311 6.60 Combremont-le-Petit 378 5.73 Constantine 327 2.81 Corcelles-le-Jorat 423 7.93 Corcelles-près-Payerne 233 12.13 Cremin 58 1.65 Cudrefin 1516 15.82 Curtilles 311 4.95 Dompierre 247 3.21 Faoug 860 3.45 Forel-sur-Lucens 152 2.83 Grandcour 851 10.21 Granges- près-Marnand 1218 7.02 Henniez 339 2.61 Hermenches 381 4.77 Lovatens 150 3.47 Lucens 3937 6.28 Marnand 161 2.26 Missy 349 3.11 Montmagny 178 3.80 Moudon 5925 15.69 Mur 203 1.78 Oleyres 240 1.92 Oulens-sur-Lucens 52 1.59 Payerne 9460 24.19 Prévonloup 172 1.84 Ropraz 407 4.83 Rossenges 65 1.07 Sarzens 50 1.44 Sassel 149 3.26 Seigneux 279 3.74 Syens 139 2.52 Trey 256 3.81 Treytorrens (Payerne) 123 3.07 Vallamand 389 2.34 Villars-Bramard 116 3.16 Villars-le-Comte 150 4.19 Villars-le-Grand 282 4.20 Villarzel 416 7.66 Vucherens 543 3.27 Vulliens 461 6.63 Total (52) 41,811 264.98 Category:2008 establishments in Switzerland Category:Broye-Vully (district)
